import React, { Component } from 'react' import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { EditLocation } from '../actions' import _ from "lodash"; class EditingLocation extends Component { render() { return (
) } } export default connect(null,{EditLocation})(EditingLocation); {/* {this.props.item.longitude} */}
